content: I'm really sorry to hear that you're going through a tough time with school. It can be really overwhelming to feel like you're not doing well. Remember, failing doesn't define your abilities or your future. It's just a bump in the road, and there are always ways to get back on track. Have you thought about talking to a teacher or counselor for some guidance? They might have resources or advice to help you improve. And don't forget to take care of yourself emotionally—it's okay to feel upset, but try to be kind to yourself too. You're capable of more than you might think right now.
